title: Watch Cinderella's Lily James Kick Undead Butt in the New Pride and Prejudice and Zombies Trailer
text: Watch Cinderella's Lily James Kick Undead Butt in the New Pride and Prejudice and Zombies Trailer "It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife," wrote Jane Austen in her acclaimed novel of manners, Pride and Prejudice.She forgot to mention that it helps if that wife also knows how to kill zombies.One woman who definitely ... Comment Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 6:10 PM Updated at 8:29 PM Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 6:10 PM Updated at 8:29 PM Â» Social News "It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife," wrote Jane Austen in her acclaimed novel of manners, Pride and Prejudice. She forgot to mention that it helps if that wife also knows how to kill zombies. One woman who definitely has that skill set is Elizabeth Bennet ( Cinderella 's Lily James ) in the forthcoming mashup spoof, Pride and Prejudice and Zombies , based on the parody novel by Seth Grahame-Smith. Check out the new trailer to see how she and her sisters put their skills to good use: Other Links From TVGuide.com
